sentences.cn: “太神奇了!”卡罗琳轻声挖苦道。

sentences.en: Caroline and Douglas will be there too.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳和道格拉斯也将出席。

sentences.en: Caroline had a chauffeured car waiting to take her to London.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳有辆配有司机的轿车，随时准备送她去伦敦。

sentences.en: Caroline joined them on the shopping expeditions.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳加入了他们的购物之旅。

sentences.en: Caroline made a faint attempt at a laugh.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳敷衍地笑了一下。

sentences.en: Caroline prefers her worktops to be clear of clutter.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳喜欢把厨房台面收拾得整整齐齐。

sentences.en: Caroline sang two verses and the chorus of her song.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳唱了她歌曲中的两段和副歌部分。

sentences.en: Caroline visited all the big stores.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳光顾了所有的大型商店。

sentences.en: Caroline was keen to make her marital home in London.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳渴望婚后把家安在伦敦。

sentences.en: Caroline was trying on one outfit after another.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳一套接一套地试穿衣服。

sentences.en: He put his arm around Caroline'sshoulders and drew her close to him.
sentences.cn: 他一只手臂搂住卡罗琳的肩膀，将她拉近自己。

sentences.en: Livy felt herself soften towards Caroline.
sentences.cn: 莉薇觉得自己对卡罗琳的态度变温和了。

sentences.en: The distant object of his affections is Caroline.
sentences.cn: 他一厢情愿地爱慕卡罗琳。

sentences.en: To soften a formal look, Caroline recommends ethnic blouses.
sentences.cn: 为了看上去不过于正式，卡罗琳建议穿有民族色彩的上衣。

sentences.en: When Caroline was five she scribbled on a wall.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳5岁时在墙上乱涂乱画。
